Class_Skill_Desc_Arcane Circle: Increases damage dealt by self and nearby party members by 3%.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Circle of Sacrifice to self and nearby party members</br>Duration: 5s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Bloodsown Circle to self</br>Duration: 6s</br>Circle of Sacrifice Effect: When you or party members under this effect successfully land a weaponskill or cast a spell, the reaper who applied it may be granted a stack of Immortal Sacrifice, up to a maximum of 8</br>Duration: 30s</br>Bloodsown Circle Effect: Allows you to accumulate stacks of Immortal Sacrifice from party members under the effect of your Circle of Sacrifice//
Class_Skill_Desc_Arcane Crest: Grants Crest of Time Borrowed to self, creating a barrier that nullifies damage totaling up to 10% of maximum HP.</br>Duration: 5s</br>Grants Crest of Time Returned to self and nearby party members within a radius of 15 yalms when barrier is completely absorbed.</br>Crest of Time Returned Effect: Gradually restores HP</br>Cure Potency: 50</br>Duration: 15s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Arm's Length: Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Bladedance: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,250.
Class_Skill_Desc_Blood Stalk: Summons your avatar to deliver an attack with a potency of 340.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Soul Reaver</br>Duration: 30s</br>Stack count will be reduced to 1 when already under the effect of Soul Reaver.</br>//Soul Gauge Cost: 50</br>Shares a recast timer with all avatar attacks except Gluttony.</br>※Action changes to Lemure's Slice while under the effect of Enshrouded.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bloodbath: Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Braver: Delivers an attack with a potency of 2,400.
Class_Skill_Desc_Communio: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 1,100 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Enshrouded effect expires upon execution.</br>Requires at least one stack of Lemure Shroud to execute.
Class_Skill_Desc_Cross Reaping: Delivers an attack with a potency of 460.</br>Enhanced Cross Reaping Potency: 520</br>Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Void Reaping</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Void Shroud</br>//Can only be executed while under the effect of Lemure Shroud.</br>Lemure Shroud Cost: 1</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Enshroud: Offers your flesh as a vessel to your avatar, gaining maximum stacks of Lemure Shroud.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Certain actions cannot be executed while playing host to your avatar.</br>Shroud Gauge Cost: 50
Class_Skill_Desc_Feint: Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 10% and magic damage dealt by 5%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Gallows: Delivers an attack with a potency of 400.</br>460 when executed from a target's rear.</br>Enhanced Gallows Potency: 460</br>Rear Enhanced Potency: 520</br>Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Gibbet</br>Duration: 60s</br>The action Blood Stalk changes to Unveiled Gibbet while under the effect of Enhanced Gibbet.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Shroud Gauge by 10</br>//Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Reaver.</br>※Action changes to Cross Reaping while under the effect of Enshrouded.
Class_Skill_Desc_Gibbet: Delivers an attack with a potency of 400.</br>460 when executed from a target's flank.</br>Enhanced Gibbet Potency: 460</br>Flank Enhanced Potency: 520</br>Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Gallows</br>Duration: 60s</br>The action Blood Stalk changes to Unveiled Gallows while under the effect of Enhanced Gallows.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Shroud Gauge by 10</br>//Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Reaver.</br>※Action changes to Void Reaping while under the effect of Enshrouded.
Class_Skill_Desc_Gluttony: Summons your avatar to deal unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 520 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Grants 2 stacks of Soul Reaver</br>Duration: 30s</br>Soul Gauge Cost: 50
Class_Skill_Desc_Grim Reaping: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Void Shroud</br>//Can only be executed while under the effect of Enshrouded.</br>Lemure Shroud Cost: 1</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Grim Swathe: Summons your avatar to deliver an attack with a potency of 140 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Soul Reaver</br>Duration: 30s</br>Stack count will be reduced to 1 when already under the effect of Soul Reaver.</br>//Soul Gauge Cost: 50</br>Shares a recast timer with all avatar attacks except Gluttony.</br>※Action changes to Lemure's Scythe while under the effect of Enshrouded.
Class_Skill_Desc_Guillotine: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Shroud Gauge by 10</br>//Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Reaver.</br>※Action changes to Grim Reaping while under the effect of Enshrouded.
Class_Skill_Desc_Harpe: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 300.
Class_Skill_Desc_Harvest Moon: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Soulsow.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hell's Egress: Quickly dash 15 yalms backwards.</br>Additional Effect: Allows next Harpe to be cast immediately</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Leaves behind a Hellsgate at point of origin, and grants Threshold to self</br>Duration: 10s</br>//Cannot be executed while bound.</br>Shares a recast timer with Hell's Ingress.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hell's Ingress: Quickly dash 15 yalms forward.</br>Additional Effect: Allows next Harpe to be cast immediately</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Leaves behind a Hellsgate at point of origin, and grants Threshold to self</br>Duration: 10s</br>//Cannot be executed while bound.</br>Shares a recast timer with Hell's Egress.
Class_Skill_Desc_Infernal Slice: Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.</br>Combo Action: Waxing Slice</br>Combo Potency: 500</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Soul Gauge by 10//
Class_Skill_Desc_Lemure's Scythe: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Void Shroud Cost: 2</br>Shares a recast timer with Lemure's Slice.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lemure's Slice: Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.</br>Void Shroud Cost: 2</br>Shares a recast timer with Lemure's Scythe.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Nightmare Scythe: Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.</br>Combo Action: Spinning Scythe</br>Combo Potency: 180</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Soul Gauge by 10//
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Arcane Crest: Grants Crest of Time Borrowed to self, creating a barrier that nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 12,000 potency.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Increases damage dealt by 10%</br>Duration: 10s</br>Grants the Crest of Time Returned to self and nearby party members within a radius of 15 yalms when barrier is completely absorbed.</br>Crest of Time Returned Effect: Gradually restores HP</br>Cure Potency: 6,000</br>Duration: 6s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Communio: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 16,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Requires at least one stack of Enshrouded.</br>Consumes all stacks of Enshrouded upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Cross Reaping: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Enshrouded and Ripe for Reaping.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Death Warrant: Afflicts target with Death Warrant, causing you to compile damage you deal to that target.</br>When effect duration expires, target takes 50% of compiled damage.</br>Duration: 7s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Soulsow</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Action changes to Harvest Moon upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Grim Swathe: Summons your avatar to deliver an attack with a potency of 4,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Soul Reaver</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Heavy +75%</br>Duration: 3s</br>※Infernal Slice Combo changes to Guillotine upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Guillotine: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Reaver.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Harvest Moon: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 4,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Potency increases up to 8,000 as the target's HP decreases, reaching its maximum value when the target has 50% HP or less.</br>Additional Effect: Absorbs 100% of damage dealt as HP</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Soulsow.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Hell's Ingress: Quickly dash 15 yalms forward.</br>Additional Effect: Leaves behind a Hellsgate at point of origin, and grants Threshold to self</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Increases movement speed by 25%</br>Duration: 5s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※Action changes to Regress upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Infernal Slice: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.</br>Combo Action: Waxing Slice</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Lemure's Slice: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: Bind</br>Duration: 3s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Enshrouded.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Plentiful Harvest: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you.</br>Potency increases up to 24,000 based on your accumulated stacks of Immortal Sacrifice, gained by executing Soul Slice, KOing enemies, or earning assists.</br>Additional Effect: Gradually fills your limit gauge</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effect can only be activated while in combat.</br>Consumes all stacks of Immortal Sacrifice upon execution.</br>Can only be executed while not under the effect of Enshrouded.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Regress: Move instantly to the Hellsgate left behind by you.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Slice: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Soul Slice: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000.</br>Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Immortal Sacrifice, up to a maximum of 8</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Tenebrae Lemurum: Offers your flesh as a vessel to your avatar, gaining 5 stacks of Enshrouded.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts nearby enemies with Hysteria</br>Hysteria Effect: Afflicted enemies are unable to act of their own free will</br>Duration: 2s</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 75s</br>Has no effect on players riding machina or non-player combatants.</br>※Action changes to Communio while under the effect of Enshrouded.</br>※Grim Swathe changes to Lemure's Slice while under the effect of Enshrouded.</br>※Infernal Slice Combo changes to Void Reaping while under the effect of Enshrouded.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Void Reaping: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Ripe for Reaping</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Enshrouded.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※Infernal Slice Combo changes to Cross Reaping while under the effect of Ripe for Reaping.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Waxing Slice: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Combo Action: Slice</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Plentiful Harvest: Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 720 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Immortal Sacrifice Cost: 1 stack</br>Potency increases up to 1,000 as stacks of Immortal Sacrifice exceed minimum cost.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Shroud Gauge by 50</br>Cannot be executed while under the effect of Bloodsown Circle.</br>Consumes all stacks of Immortal Sacrifice upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Regress: Move instantly to the Hellsgate left behind by you.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Threshold.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Shadow of Death: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Death's Design, increasing damage you deal target by 10%</br>Duration: 30s</br>Extends duration of Death's Design by 30s to a maximum of 60s.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 10 if target is KO'd before effect expires//
Class_Skill_Desc_Slice: Delivers an attack with a potency of 320.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 10//
Class_Skill_Desc_Soul Scythe: Delivers an attack with a potency of 180 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 50</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>//Shares a recast timer with Soul Slice.</br>Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.
Class_Skill_Desc_Soul Slice: Delivers an attack with a potency of 460.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 50</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>//Shares a recast timer with Soul Scythe.</br>Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.
Class_Skill_Desc_Soulsow: Grants Soulsow to self, changing the action to Harvest Moon.</br>Cast time is instant when used outside of battle.
Class_Skill_Desc_Spinning Scythe: Delivers an attack with a potency of 140 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 10//
Class_Skill_Desc_True North: Nullifies all action direction requirements.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Unveiled Gallows: Summons your avatar to deliver an attack with a potency of 400.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Soul Reaver</br>Duration: 30s</br>Stack count will be reduced to 1 when already under the effect of Soul Reaver.</br>Soul Gauge Cost: 50</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Enhanced Gallows.</br>Shares a recast timer with all avatar attacks except Gluttony.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Unveiled Gibbet: Summons your avatar to deliver an attack with a potency of 400.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Soul Reaver</br>Duration: 30s</br>Stack count will be reduced to 1 when already under the effect of Soul Reaver.</br>Soul Gauge Cost: 50</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Enhanced Gibbet.</br>Shares a recast timer with all avatar attacks except Gluttony.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Void Reaping: Delivers an attack with a potency of 460.</br>Enhanced Void Reaping Potency: 520</br>Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Cross Reaping</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Void Shroud</br>//Can only be executed while under the effect of Enshrouded.</br>Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.</br>Lemure Shroud Cost: 1</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Waxing Slice: Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.</br>Combo Action: Slice</br>Combo Potency: 400</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Soul Gauge by 10//
Class_Skill_Desc_Whorl of Death: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Death's Design, increasing damage you deal target by 10%</br>Duration: 30s</br>Extends duration of Death's Design by 30s to a maximum of 60s.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 10 if target is KO'd before effect expires//
Class_Status_Desc_Bloodbath: Attacks generate HP equal to the amount of physical damage dealt.
Class_Status_Desc_Death Warrant: Damage taken from the reaper who applied this effect is compiled. Triggers additional damage when the effect expires.
Class_Status_Desc_Feint: Sustaining increased damage from target who executed Feint.
Class_Trait_Desc_Death Scythe Mastery: Increases the potency of Slice to 300, Waxing Slice to 140, Shadow of Death to 300, Harpe to 300, Spinning Scythe to 140, Infernal Slice to 140, Whorl of Death to 100, and Nightmare Scythe to 120.
Class_Trait_Desc_Death Scythe Mastery II: Increases the potency of Slice to 320, Waxing Slice to 160, and Infernal Slice to 180.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Arcane Circle: Grants Circle of Sacrifice to you and nearby party members upon executing Arcane Circle.</br>Duration: 5s</br>When you or party members under this effect successfully land a weaponskill or cast a spell, you may gain a stack of Immortal Sacrifice, up to a maximum of 8.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Also grants Bloodsown Circle to self, allowing you to receive stacks of Immortal Sacrifice from party members under the effect of your Circle of Sacrifice.</br>Duration: 6s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Arcane Crest: Grants Crest of Time Returned to self and nearby party members, gradually restoring HP over time. This effect is only granted when the Crest of Time Borrowed barrier is completely absorbed.</br>Cure Potency: 50</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Avatar: Grants the effect of Soul Reaver upon successfully landing Blood Stalk or Grim Swathe.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect ends upon execution of any weaponskill or magic attack.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Shroud: Grants Void Shroud upon landing Void Reaping, Cross Reaping, or Grim Reaping.
Class_Trait_Desc_Hellsgate: Upon executing Hell's Ingress or Hell's Egress, leave behind a Hellsgate and grant Threshold to self.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Hell's Ingress changes to Regress after executing Hell's Egress, and vice versa.
Class_Trait_Desc_Shroud Gauge: Allows for Shroud Gauge accumulation upon the landing of Gibbet, Gallows, or Guillotine.
Class_Trait_Desc_Soul Gauge: Allows for Soul Gauge accumulation upon the landing of certain actions, or defeating enemies under the effect of Death's Design.
Class_Trait_Desc_Tempered Soul: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Soul Slice and Soul Scythe.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
